name: cylinder
script:
# DocType: Roast Batch
# Event: After Submit

def to_float(val):
    try:
        return float(val) if val not in (None, "") else 0.0
    except Exception:
        return 0.0

# write Cylinder History rows (one per round)
for r in (doc.rounds or []):
    ch = frappe.new_doc("Cylinder History")
    ch.roast_date     = doc.roast_date
    ch.roast_batch    = doc.name
    ch.round_no       = r.round_no
    ch.bean_group     = r.bean_group
    ch.roast_cylinder = r.roast_cylinder or doc.roast_cylinder
    ch.input_qty      = to_float(r.input_qty)
    ch.output_qty     = to_float(r.output_qty)
    ch.loss_qty       = to_float(r.loss_qty)
    ch.quacker        = to_float(r.quacker)
    ch.notes          = r.notes
    ch.insert(ignore_permissions=True)
